_notes: Releases an Integration Pack, creating a deployable snapshot
Must be called AFTER adding all PackagedComponents to the pack
After release, changes to the pack require a new release
Response includes the released packageId used for deployment

MULTI-PACKAGE SAFETY PATTERN: Before releasing, query the Integration Pack state to retrieve ALL currently included PackagedComponents. Include every component (existing + new) in the ReleasePackagedComponents array, each with its target version. This prevents accidentally dropping existing packages from the IP â€” omitting a component from the array removes it from the release.

Safety steps: (1) GET /IntegrationPack/{integrationPackId} to list current components and versions, (2) append the new prodPackageId + version to the list, (3) include the full merged list in ReleasePackagedComponents below.
